class.name: Expression
class.brief_description: A class that stores an expression you can execute.

method.name: execute
method.description: Executes the expression that was previously parsed by [method parse] and returns the result. Before you use the returned object, you should check if the method failed by calling [method has_execute_failed].

method.name: get_error_text
method.description: Returns the error text if [method parse] has failed.

method.name: parse
method.description: Parses the expression and returns a [enum @GlobalScope.Error].
